channel.title: Timer
channel.description:
I need to know how to add a timer when you log in that you can't drop, trade or die with any of the starting items that new players receive to avoid people making accounts and transferring the starters.
It's a Dementhium-based 637.
Thanks!

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @TremblayX TremblayX
item.description:
@TremblayX wrote:

Can you guys please be more clear, besides the tutorial island one.

Read full topic

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Add a tick or use a try & catch interruption for thread.Sleep(seconds*1000);

Read full topic

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“TremblayX, post:1, topic:433442”]I need to know how to add a timer when you log in that you can’t drop, trade or die with any of the starting items that new players receive to avoid people making accounts and transferring the starters.

It’s a Dementhium-based 637.

Thanks![/quote]

As an alternative, may I suggest implementing the Tutorial Island? Having to do it repeatedly may discourage them from doing that.

Read full topic
